name: The Missing Piece Makes it Right
name_original: The Missing Piece Makes it Right
description:
The Missing Piece was written and illustrated by Shel Silverstein in 1976. So even if the character here looks like Pacman: it's not Pacman. The story is quite profound, about idealising relationships and wether or not finding one's missing piece is automatically going to equate in happiness. 

But along the way, it breaks a piece. This is about what might happen if it went back. 

This project is not for profit. I claim no copy right on the story of figures and I will make no money off of its creation. It is a love letter to Silverstein's work, made for a gamejam 20.07.2020.
